title: Polenta with Cream
introduction: Polenta with Cream is a comforting dish that brings warmth and coziness to any meal. Originating from a traditional Milanese trattoria, this simple recipe is perfect for cold winter days. The addition of mascarpone or heavy cream, along with shaved Parmigiano-Reggiano, elevates the creamy polenta to decadent heights. For a luxurious twist, you can add fresh, shaved white or black truffles.
instructions: Prepare the polenta if necessary. Then pour the hot cooked polenta onto a warm serving platter.
Spoon the mascarpone on top or pour on the cream. With a swivel-blade vegetable peeler, shave the Parmigiano over the top. Serve immediately.
